hints.content:
When we add a number, we jump that distance to the right on the number line.

To show $\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}+\blueD{8}$, we need to show $\maroonD{8}$ jumps of $\blueD{8}$ units.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 64 with tick marks at every 8 units. An arrow begins at the 0 tick mark and moves right on the number line, pointing to the labeled tick marks at 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, and 64. Each arrow is labeled plus 8. !

hints.content:
This number line best represents $8\times 8$:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 64 with tick marks at every 1 unit. An arrow begins at the 0 tick mark and moves right on the number line, pointing to the labeled tick marks at 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, and 64. !

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0 to 16 with tick marks at every 1 unit. An arrow begins at the 0 tick mark and moves right on the number line, pointing to the labeled tick marks at 8 and 16.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/cefef05354dd7b4f76f64165d4482bd56a99c95e)

![A number line labeled 0 to 56 with tick marks at every 1 unit. An arrow begins at the 0 tick mark and moves right on the number line, pointing to the labeled tick marks at 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, and 56.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/52020fdee66ff00c5d00cf54da4e7ae2f9ce9965)

![A number line labeled 0 to 64 with tick marks at every 1 unit. An arrow begins at the 0 tick mark and moves right on the number line, pointing to the labeled tick marks at 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, 56, and 64.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/afb50466186e6f8219d0265490475927f3e34721)
